reviews.review:
I didn't think I would like this game, being how old it is and how I don't usually play these type of games, but oh boyyyy was I wrong.

This game SMACKS. It was super fun to play and I love the sci-fi elements. The story is intriguing so far as well!

I am officially with the science team!!!!
(and excited to play the other games in the series xP)
As someone who plays Cs-go i'll take any type of life
u can use half life source fixed here is the link https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-source-fixed

L'histoire te donne envie de continuer de jouer encore et encore, le bestiaire est vraiment sympa, peu d'armes mais comment en vouloir √† un jeu sorti en 1998. Etant un grand fan de Garry's Mod, √ßa fait vraiment plaisir de jouer aux jeux qui a pu permettre √† GMod de na√Ætre. Je me suis achet√© la collection Half-Life alors j'ai h√¢te de d√©couvrir toute l'histoire.

[h1] the game is so fucking extra celestial [/h1]
i rate things by what it has: story and multiplayer

Story: 11/10
the story is amazing, and its environment tells its story just as well the game-play dose, you a worker at black mesa gets into a [u]freak disaster[/u] and survive with [strike]just a crowbar[/strike]

Multiplayer: 8.5
the multiplayer is rough around the edges but other than that i learned how to play in about two minutes, how ever there is not a hole lot of players playing anymore but do check it out once in a while "who know's" you might find some
dont shoot im with the science team
one of the best fps games ever made
Relive the classic days of Video Gaming History when Steam was only a idea in Gabens head .
its fun but you'll get stuck sometimes. i've not completed the game so i can't say much abt it
fun game good graphics especially for 1998 if you like fps games this is a must play!

this game is pretty hard later on but it is still fun, although i dont think it has aged that well, especially compared to half life 2
still a good game though
One of the best games ever made. Still fun as hell in 2022.
muy bueno, la verdad me encanta, ya lo e jugado hace tiempo, lo recomiendo mucho

Good ol' Half-Life

But goddamn Xen is annoying
I didn't know dev added HD models. Looks better than I remember.

This was sitting in my steam library for just short of ten years.. I decided to finally play it. I really enjoyed this game. The old graphics are cool, and the gameplay is an enjoyable mix of FPS and puzzles. I enjoyed the story and how it unfolds. There are not many cutscenes,  most of the story plays out with the characters and action right in front of you, with you still in control. 
TL;DR: You can hit the boxes rapidly with the crowbar, and it makes a funny sound. 10/10
I honestly cannot fathom how people played this back then. Black Mesa is a much more enjoyable experience if you want to play Half Life
Awesome classic ground breaking game for its time. Even with current gen games it still holds up! Definitely worth a play if you've never played it before.
No, I'm with the science team!
Sin palabras, mas de 20 a√±os y sigue siendo un juego 10/10
epikisimo el juego esta bueno y  los bichos estan hot y su rule34 es... ufff
i reccomend highly that you alL play this game 1st
Fun, but why did this game often force close?

I game was solid, but not as good as people make it out to be. What I mean is, it's not "top 10 games of all time," but you should still give it a shot. 

3/5
Alla ska ha spelat detta kultspel
Jogo cl√°ssico que √© muito gostosinho de jogar apesar do planeta xen ser meio meh, o resto √© quase perfeito, vale muito a pena jogar e zerar, tendo altas horas de gameplay
Pretty Good. My favorite part was when Jill from Resident Evil started sucking Gordon off. Thought it was strange at first but now I'm not so judging.

I know I will get a lot of hate for this, but I can't recommend this game 25 years after release.

I'm sure everyone who played it when it came out thought it was a masterpiece, and I'm sure it was for it's time. Unfortunately it's aged like milk.

Pros: Okay'ish gameplay and story (ended in cliffhanger)

Cons: Movement
Combat
Bossfights
No help at all. Not even how some of the weapons work differently (Like laser tracker for the rocket launcher and how to remove it)
Saves are useless. You'll always be pulled back 10 minutes of your progress because some enemy was hiding inside a wall or blew you up because the scripted event came too late...

I will unfortunately give this one a 1/10. 
I can't remember the last time I was frustrated by how badly a game was. Again, 25 years ago I'm sure it was the best. But now it's really bad in comparison. An updated Half Life would have been nice, not remaster but updated controls, removed glitches, crashes and better saves.
One of the best games ever made
Redefined the future of technology and gaming, everyone should try this classic out.
nerd gets bullied in school and brings gun to fight imaginary aliens and soldiers
